overview_of_class: This is the laboratory course associated with CHEM 101-CN General Chemistry. The lab covers chemical analysis of real samples using basic laboratory techniques, including titration, colorimetric analysis, density measurements and atomic spectroscopy. The course includes planning, data collection, interpretation, and reporting on these experiments. Credit for this course is 0.34 units. Enrollment is concurrent with CHEM 101-CN.
name: General Chemistry Laboratory
title: SCS CHEM 121-CN-100 General Chemistry Laboratory
enrl_requirement:
Enrollment Requirements: Co-Requisite: Students must also register for Chemistry 101-CN.
Add both classes to the shopping cart and submit together for successful registration.
